name: Alpha & Beta
description: Alpha & Beta is a 2d platform game for those who love old platform games but with a few touches on this old style, the most important features are the high degree of difficulty and the promise of a satisfying gaming experience with a long gameplay time
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 Processor: Intel速 Pentium速 D1519 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 3650 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 250 MB available space
